text: “ ‘Guma, ana khuarani kɨv, ana tuituigip Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar kha siosi ga nzuai buni mbarari. Guma, ana maaŋ muuŋgip ntarar muuŋv, ana ŋkasŋkagip, mba ntara kambararga, gu ntige kha zorga ki mba, mana thanen ana nɨɨŋgirga. Gu vhɨra kɨma hurar ana nɨɨŋgirga. Gu mba kɨma hurar, gu ana zɨn kama khergirga. Mba zɨ, guma the ana kaŋgirga fhuvara. Mba kɨma ndigi guma, ana nduara mba zɨ kaŋgirga.’ ” 2.17 Mana, ana Fhe Bakɨme fhum Isreriŋ mba gumgi ki fhu nuianan vui, ana mba mban mbe ndɨɨim, mbe nta mbegi. Ndu Kisim Bek sapta16 gu Buk Song sapta 78.24 ganɨ.
